title: National Education Week by EDGE
desc: Founded by Devin Schain, a serial education entrepreneur,   and cohosted with NYU? , advances education innovation and excellence across the entire education and learning landscapes from cradle through career and lifelong learning ? by providing intellectual, financial and network capital to education innovators, whether they operate in classrooms, homes, or offices. What Silicon Valley is to Technology, New York is to Education Innovation We are passionate about the value of connecting education thought leaders from disparate sectors to create a community of innovation. While we serve a national and international audience, EDGE?s base in New York City is significant. NYC has America?s largest student and learner population (more than 2 million enrolled students), the world?s largest educational publishers and corporate trainers, the largest instructional designers and curriculum developers. It also is home to successful technology companies, thriving innovation hubs, education-focused investors, and distinctive colleges and universities. It will serve as a ?Silicon Valley of Education.?
